item.title: Obstruction of Right of Way, 28th August

item.title: Pothole on junction of north end road and peareswood road, 28th August
item.description:
Large pothole /subsidence on corner of road, which is causing vibration in the old cottages in peareswood road, especially at night when HGV s can go faster as less traffic. This has been repaired at least twice but not properly as breaks up in the rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peareswood Road, North End, London

item.title: Suspicious behaviour by a certain group coming over to the corner of the park, 28th August
item.description:
Could Peabody please have a look into this corner of the park as suspicious behaviour has been seen by alot of the neighbours who complain random people are coming here and hiding away their drugs, This causes issues for people walking their dogs. Also the street lamp next to this corner is retrofitted ontop of the main one but the lamp itself needs a refurbishment as it's not bright due to the low lumens and the trees blocking the solar panel. Could Peabody please fix this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pettman Crescent, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
